General.Name: Thunderbird Entertainment Group Inc
General.Description: Thunderbird Entertainment Group Inc. develops, produces, and distributes film and television programs in Canada, the United States, Denmark, the Republic of Ireland, and internationally. Its portfolio consists of animated, factual, and scripted projects. The company's programs cover various genres with a focus on children's productions, scripted comedy and dramas, and unscripted contents. The company also acquires, licenses, and merchandises distribution rights. Thunderbird Entertainment Group Inc. is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 123 West 7th Avenue, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V5Y 1L8
